TopicTitle: A suggestion for a New career mode.

Articles.Content:
My son really wants to make video for his science class, also they have machines at school onto where they can play games in which if the game is educational enough they would buy it. 

It would be nice to have an educational mode. For example: when you collect science data it portraits an educational fact about astronomy, soil, space, weightlessness etc. 

also making controls and flight are much easier.

I think you could expand to a broader audience by making a child's educational mode and do not think it would be too much work.
There is an [educational version of KSP](http://kerbaledu.com/) - I haven't used it myself so I don't know how it differs from the standard version (apart from licensing).

> 
> It would be nice to have an educational mode. For example: when you collect science data it portraits an educational fact about astronomy, soil, space, weightlessness etc.

So you're thinking something like the Crowd-Sourced Science mod, but with the flavour text focusing on education rather than comedy?
